name: Number Puzzle - Brain Games
description:
Number Puzzle - The Brain Season 5 challenge project.
Arrange the numbers in sequence in the least moves and time possible. Can you do it?
Do you want to know your grade in world rankings? Come and challenge!

FEATURES:

- Multiple patterns
- Global rankings
- Highly accurate timekeeping
- Perfect adaptation for iPhoneX
- Absolutely has a solution
- Exquisitely, simple and easy
- Social sharing

If you like our game, please leave us a comment.
